text: <FI> and that<Fi> the whole land thereof is brimstone, and salt, <FI>and<Fi> a burning, <FI>that<Fi> it is not sown, nor beareth, nor any grass groweth therein, like the overthrow of Sodom and Gomorrah, Admah and Zeboiim, which Jehovah overthrew in his anger, and in his wrath:
name: Deuteronomy 29:23
